DOC.brief_summary: To compare the efficiency of the Infiniti vision system and the Series 20000 Legacy System phacoemulsification units during routine cataract extraction.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of the Performance of the Infiniti Vision and the Series 20000 Legacy Phacoemulsification Systems
DOC.criteria: Cataract Eligible for cataract extraction with primary implantation of a posterior chamber IOL 2 to 3+ cataract density Preoperative ocular pathology that can affect visual acuity Corneal irregularities such as keratoconus, corneal dystrophy, corneal opacities. Previous intraocular or corneal surgery. Other ocular surgery at the time of the cataract extraction. Surgical Significant intraoperative intraocular bleeding Detached Descemetâ€™s membrane Implantation of the intraocular lens in the anterior chamber or sulcus
